thread.title: Suspect arrested in gunpoint robbery of 2 Temple students
thread.title_full: Suspect arrested in gunpoint robbery of 2 Temple students - WTRF 7 News Sports Weather - Wheeling Steubenville

author: cbs8
title: Suspect arrested in gunpoint robbery of 2 Temple students
text:
PHILADELPHIA (AP) - Police say they've made an arrest in the gunpoint robberies of two students last week near Temple University.
Robert Sherrill was arraigned Sunday on charges of robbery, aggravated assault and other offenses in the incidents a few blocks from the North Philadelphia campus.
Police say the 26-year-old Sherrill and another man stole a 21-year-old Temple football player's wallet and phone before fleeing in the player's Cadillac sedan around 1 a.m. on Oct. 15.
Another student was held up on North 15th Street around 3:30 a.m. His wallet and cellphone were taken.
The students were not injured.
Sherrill is jailed in lieu of $50,000 bail pending a Nov. 3 preliminary hearing. Online court records didn't list a lawyer to comment on the charges.
